name: stock_get_financial_stmts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: return financial statements for 'income', 'balance',  or 'cash'

frequency.description: The frequency of the financial statements. It can be either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

statement_type.description: The type of financial statement to retrieve. It can be 'income', 'balance', 'cash', or a list containing these types.

region.description: The region of the stock market. Defaults to 'US'. Allowed values are 'US', 'BR', 'AU', 'CA', 'FR', 'DE', 'HK', 'IN', 'IT', 'ES', 'GB', 'S'.
